title: Status of preparedness of documentation for the Fifth Committee during the main part of the eightieth session of the General Assembly

paragraphs.1: The attention of the members of the Fifth Committee is drawn to the note by the Secretariat (A/C.5/80/1) indicating the items allocated to the Committee for consideration during the eightieth session of the General Assembly.
paragraphs.2: Agenda item/symbol Title or description Estimated date of issuance Status of issuance A/80/7/Add.1 Report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions 1 October Request for a subvention to the Extraordinary Chambers in the Courts of Cambodia A/80/ Agenda item/symbol Title or description Estimated date of issuance Status of issuance Revised estimates resulting from resolutions and decisions adopted by the General Assembly A/80/ Agenda item/symbol Title or description Estimated date of issuance Status of issuance Item 140 Scale of assessments for the apportionment of the expenses of the United Nations A/80/11 Report of the Committee on Contributions on its eighty-fifth session Issued A/80/72 Report of the Secretary-General on multi-year payment plans Issued Item 142 Report on the activities of the Ethics Office A/80/79 Note by the Secretary-General transmitting the report of the Ethics Office Issued Item 144 United Nations common system A/80/30 Report of the International Civil Service Commission for 2025 22 October A/C.5/80/3 Statement submitted by the Secretary-General in accordance with rule 153 of the rules of procedure of the General Assembly on the programme budget implications arising from recommendations contained in the report of the International Civil Service Commission for 2025 Issued A/80/ Agenda item/symbol Title or description Estimated date of issuance Status of issuance A/80/
